lead_paragraph: CASTELLANOS--Elida, on January 21, 2016. Beloved wife the late Ambassador Rafael Castellanos. Loving mother of Rafael (Andria) Castellanos and the late Brenda (Paul) Schietroma. Cherished grandmother of Nae (Manuel) Breidenbach, Christina (Chad) Weaver, Rafael Castellanos and David Castellanos. Devoted great-grandmother of Nina and Courtney. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell "The Funeral Chapel" 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street, today 2pm-5pm and 7pm-9pm. Mass of Christian burial, Saturday, 9am at St. Ignatius Loyola R.C. Church, 84th Street and Park Avenue, NYC. Interment to follow at Woodlawn Cemetery, Bronx, NY. In lieu of flowers, contributions in Mrs. Castellanos' memory may be made to the Central Park Medical Unit, PO Box 440 New York, NY 10028 or CPMU.com 1/3
